footer.description: Promoting Domain-Driven Design development in Taiwan and building professional technical communities.
hero.subtitle: Taiwan Domain Driven Design Conference
hero.bannerAlt: DDDTW 2025 - AI Era Software Development Practices Conference
about.title: About the Conference
about.description: DDDesign TW is committed to promoting the development of Domain-Driven Design in Taiwan. Through our annual conference, we bring together industry experts and practitioners to share the latest trends and practical experiences in system design and socio-technical practices.
about.community.title: Professional Community
about.community.description: Gathering Taiwan's finest system design experts and practitioners
about.practice.title: Practical Sharing
about.practice.description: Deep exploration of Domain-Driven Design applications in real-world projects
about.exchange.title: Technical Exchange
about.exchange.description: Promoting industry exchange and the development of technical knowledge inheritance
tickets.title: Ticket Information
tickets.subtitle: Join us to explore software development methods in the AI era
tickets.bringId: Please bring ID on event day
tickets.note1: Please ensure registration information is correct to avoid affecting entry
tickets.note2: Please bring ID and electronic ticket on event day
tickets.note3: Recording and filming are prohibited in the venue
tickets.faq1Question: Q: Can I buy tickets on-site?
tickets.faq1Answer: A: To ensure seating, we recommend purchasing tickets online in advance. On-site tickets are subject to availability and not guaranteed.
tickets.faq2Answer: A: There are currently no student discounts, but the early bird ticket is already discounted, so we recommend taking advantage of it.
tickets.faq3Question: Q: Will there be online streaming?
tickets.faq3Answer: A: To protect the rights of on-site participants, this conference does not provide online streaming. We appreciate your understanding.
tickets.calendarDescription: Click the button below to add DDDTW 2025 Conference to your calendar and don't miss this exciting event!
tickets.calendarReminder: üí° After adding to calendar, you will receive reminder notifications before the event starts
tickets.notYetAvailableMessage: Tickets are not yet available for sale. Please follow our latest news for sale notifications!
calendar.description: Add the conference time to your calendar and never miss important events
calendar.eventDescription: Domain Driven Design Taiwan 2025 Conference - Software Development Methods in the AI Era. Explore the latest technology trends with top experts and share practical experience and best practices.
calendar.eventLocation: Taipei Chamber of Commerce (6F, No.72, Sec.2, Nanjing E. Rd., Zhongshan Dist., Taipei City)
about.mainDescription: Domain Driven Design Taiwan (DDD Taiwan) is committed to promoting Domain-Driven Design and practical experience in Taiwan.
about.paragraph1: Domain Driven Design Taiwan (DDD Taiwan) is committed to promoting Domain-Driven Design and practical experience in Taiwan.
about.paragraph2: Through organizing various software development activities, we enable developers to implement DDD in project execution and engineering design, promoting teamwork and creating valuable products and services, fostering professional technical exchanges in the DDD domain worldwide.
about.paragraph3: At Domain Driven Design Taiwan (DDD Taiwan), we are committed to collaborative creation with everyone who loves solving problems.
about.paragraph4: Here we focus on organizing multiple exchange activities, developing Problem Domain to generate Solution Domain together, and building DDD thinking to help more people understand it.
about.facebookCallout: Visit our Facebook group for more information and learning discussions.
about.communityExchangeDesc: Building an open and friendly technical community where everyone interested in DDD can participate in discussions and learning.
about.knowledgeSharingDesc: Through workshops, talks, and hands-on activities, we share practical experience and best practices of Domain Driven Design.
about.practicalApplicationDesc: Helping developers apply DDD concepts to real projects and solve real-world software design challenges.
agenda.subtitle: November 8, 2025 - Software Development Methods in the AI Era
agenda.speaker: Speaker
agenda.materials: Conference materials will be available for download after the event
speakers.subtitle: Explore the latest tech trends with top experts
speakers.topicNavHint: Click arrows or swipe to switch topics
speakers.switchTopicHint: Click the topic tabs above to switch between different fields of speakers
rules.noRecordingTitle: Important Notice: Photography and Recording Prohibited
rules.noRecordingContent: To protect all attendees' privacy rights, this conference strictly prohibits any form of video recording or audio recording. This includes but is not limited to the use of mobile phones, cameras, video cameras, and any other recording devices. Violators will be immediately asked to leave and will not receive a refund.
rules.welcomeMessage: Domain Driven Design Taiwan Conference 2025 is committed to providing a safe and friendly environment for every attendee. Regardless of your gender, sexual orientation, physical or mental condition, appearance, body type, race, or religious beliefs, we welcome your participation. We will not tolerate any form of harassment, including sexual harassment in speech and imagery. Violators will be warned or asked to leave at the conference's discretion, without refund.
rules.violationBehaviors: The following behaviors are considered violations: discriminatory remarks involving gender, sexual orientation, physical or mental condition, appearance, body type, race, religion; displaying inappropriate sexually suggestive images in public places; deliberate intimidation, stalking, or following others; harassing photographers and recording personnel; continuously disrupting speeches or other activities; inappropriate physical contact; any form of sexual harassment.
rules.immediateStop: All attendees must immediately stop when they discover their own inappropriate behavior. Additionally, conference staff (including volunteers) must not wear sexually suggestive clothing or engage in any behavior that may create an inappropriate atmosphere.
rules.consequences: For violations, the conference reserves the right to take appropriate measures, including warnings or requiring violators to leave the venue without refund.
rules.reportHarassment: If you are harassed, notice others being harassed, or have any concerns, please immediately contact the staff. You can identify conference staff by their identification badges. Our staff will help you contact venue security or relevant departments, provide escort or other necessary assistance to ensure your safety during the conference. We value your participation.
rules.expectation: We expect all attendees to follow these codes of conduct at the conference venue and related social activities.
rules.interactionWelcome: During the conference, we warmly welcome interactions between attendees, speakers, and sponsors. However,
rules.privacyProtection: to protect all participants' privacy, this conference strictly prohibits any photography, video recording, or audio recording
rules.respectPrivacy: . Please respect everyone's privacy and personal space.
rules.maintainRights: We expect all participants to jointly maintain everyone's rights and respect speakers' intellectual property rights. If you have any questions, please consult the on-site staff.
rules.strictlyProhibited: Strictly prohibited: any form of video or audio recording
rules.respectAll: Please respect all attendees, speakers, and staff
rules.noHarassment: Prohibit any form of harassment or discriminatory behavior
rules.maintainCleanliness: Keep the venue clean and maintain a good environment together
rules.contactStaff: If you have any problems or need assistance, please contact staff immediately
rules.helpMessage: If you encounter any problems or need assistance during the conference, please contact our staff immediately.
transportation.fullAddress: 6F, No. 72, Sec. 2, Nanjing E. Rd., Zhongshan Dist., Taipei City
transportation.mapClickHint: Click the map for detailed route planning
transportation.busReminder: Take bus to Nanjing Jilin Road Intersection stop, walk about 1-2 minutes.
transportation.mrtLines: Zhonghe Xinlu Line, Songshan Xindian Line
transportation.drivingAddress: No. 72, Sec. 2, Nanjing E. Rd., Zhongshan Dist., Taipei City
transportation.drivingNotes: Enter via Linsen N. Rd. or Songjiang Rd. Heavy traffic downtown, recommend avoiding rush hours and departing early.
transportation.streetParkingNotes: According to Taipei Parking Management Office, Nanjing E. Rd. Sec. 4 and nearby areas have paid street parking at NT$30 per hour.
transportation.privateParkingNotes: Chang'an Elementary School Underground Parking: NT$40/hour (9AM-6PM), NT$30/hour (6PM-9AM) for cars.
transportation.motorcycleParkingNotes: Use paid street parking on Nanjing E. Rd. Sec. 2, or Chang'an Elementary Underground Parking at NT$10/hour.
transportation.parkingSuggestionNotes: Recommend using parking space apps or taking public transport to avoid parking hassles.
transportation.mrtWalkAdvantages: Fast and comfortable, direct walk from Songjiang Nanjing Station.
transportation.mrtWalkNotes: Check MRT operating hours, top up card if insufficient balance.
transportation.busTransferAdvantages: Direct to Nanjing Jilin Road Intersection stop, convenient for those unfamiliar with MRT transfers.
transportation.busTransferNotes: May have waiting time during rush hours.
transportation.drivingWarning: Parking difficult downtown, heavy traffic, plan ahead.
transportation.tip1: Use EasyCard/iPASS for MRT and bus transfers with discounts
transportation.tip2: Check bus real-time apps for arrival times
transportation.precaution1: Avoid rush hours on event day (07:30‚Äì09:00, 17:00‚Äì19:00)
transportation.precaution3: Contact conference staff if assistance needed
